name: mgsc-js
description: mgsc-js is a Javascript version of [MGSC](https://github.com/digital-sound-antiques/mgsc) (MML to MGS compiler) build with [Emuscripten](https://github.com/kripken/emscripten).

scripts.cmake: mkdirp build && cd build && emcmake cmake .. && make && cp-cli libmgsc.js ../lib/libmgsc.js

author: Mitsutaka Okazaki
